summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackWith a creamy, blendable formula and natural matte finish, Essence Foundation Stick has got you covered! It's perfect for a light, effortless look or quick touch-ups. Your skin's new BFF in a stick!
details: DetailsFeaturesMulti-use versatilityCreamy and easy-to-blend formulaSoft, matte finishFormulated WithoutAnimal by-productMicroplastic particlesParabensPreservativesLactoseOilItem 2640630How To UseGlide Essence Stick Foundation directly on to the skin and blend with a make-up buffer brush. You can also take make-up buffer brush and take product directly from the stick. Once applied to the face, gently blend evenly for a beautiful medium to sheer coverage look.IngredientsCaprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecanol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Kaolin, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Synthetic Wax, Dimethicone, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dicalcium Phosphate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Trihydroxystearin, Aroma (Flavor), Dimethyl Phenethyl Acetate, CI 15850 (Red 6), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).
how_to_use: Glide Essence Stick Foundation directly on to the skin and blend with a make-up buffer brush. You can also take make-up buffer brush and take product directly from the stick. Once applied to the face, gently blend evenly for a beautiful medium to sheer coverage look.

reviews.headline: Good foundation sticks
reviews.comments:
The texture of this foundation stick is just right. It is not as stiff as either the Milani or Maybelline stick. It blends out beautifully. It does have a slightly dewy finish, but even so it is blurring. It lasts all day too. I do need to mix two shades to get a good match but since they are so affordable I don't mind. I also go a stick in a lighter shade for concealer and a darker shade for bronzer‚Äîboth work great! 
I use 180 mixed with 140 as foundation 
130 as concealer 
201 as bronzer

reviews.headline: Totally recommend for every day foundation!
reviews.comments: I was a little hesitant to purchase this product because of the reviews and also never used a foundation stick, BUT, I am glad i did, it does cover up skin, slides super smooth, perfect for those every day quick make up routines. Would buy again!

reviews.headline: Not good as a foundation
reviews.comments: It doesn't work well as a foundation.I use it  under my eyes to lighten that area over another foundation.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I gave it 4 stars because it isn't that good of coverage but I like how creamy it is and easy it is to apply

reviews.headline: very nice!
reviews.comments: super easy to blend and not too pale for my pale skin. actually looks natural

reviews.headline: great stick foundation!
reviews.comments:
Affordable ‚úÖÔ∏è
Medium coverage ‚úÖÔ∏è
Does not oxidize ‚úÖÔ∏è
Extremely lightweight ‚úÖÔ∏è
I cannot believe how truly comfortable this is to wear.  Literally feels like I have nothing on.  I personally don't even set it with powder and I have combo skin.  Best stick foundation I've ever tried!

reviews.headline: FOUNDATION
reviews.comments: I have never used Stick Foundation but i was s little hesitant on buying but the only reason i did buy is because any product this company puts on the market is more then 5 stars so I absolutely love this product its light and creamy and true to color and it doesn't even feel like a Foundation ‚Ä¶ highly recommend üòäüòä

reviews.headline: Melted before I got it
reviews.comments: It melted before i even got it, tried to use it anyway but it broke off. Very orange and texture isnt really good, does blend well though.

reviews.headline: Amazing!!! Must try!!!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this foundation stick!! I have never tried a stick foundation before. This one is affordable, lightweight, creamy, and super easy to blend. I am super picky about foundation. This one is going to be my go to! It can be sheer or built up to medium coverage. Which i like because i dont like to feel like I have anything on. I dont feel it on my face at all truly looks like my skin but better.

reviews.headline: Best foundation stick I tried
reviews.comments: It blends like a dream, has a medium coverage and a skin like finish. Is literally your skin but better. I bought shade 50 as a foundation and shade 220 as a bronzer and is just chef's kiss. 100% recommended, run to buy it!

reviews.headline: Surprised
reviews.comments:
I got this to use it to cover up during the day- was headed to the amusement park and wanted something to use for touch ups...

after its initial use, I decided to do a wear test on it. I've recently became a fan of stick foundations, and this one is pretty good. especially for the price. I have already picked up a back up one, and use a darker shade as a brontour. 

highly recommend.

I have dry skin, thats considered mature.

reviews.headline: Clingy and Dry
reviews.comments: Despite it being marketed as a glowy moisturizing foundation i found no matter how much skin prep i did it clung to my dry patches really bad. It's so cakey for how little coverage it has.

reviews.headline: Nice But Doesn't Last on Skin
reviews.comments: The ease of this formulation was really nice, and the shade match was pretty spot on. However, within an hour or so I noticed that this started breaking up on my face and my pigmentation started showing through again. Bummer because it's such an affordable product, but it just does not last on the skin.

reviews.headline: This is great!
reviews.comments: I have always liked essence so i thought id try this a try and WOW was i happy i did goes on smooth glides over your skin beautiful and feels lightweight going back to get a few more.

reviews.headline: tea
reviews.comments: good price and it works better than my luxury foundation sticks

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: I am in love with this product. Stays all day and my skin looks great.

reviews.headline: Great foundation!!
reviews.comments: I really like this foundation, it's very buildable and leaves a bit of a satin finished, but doesn't emphasize any texture to me. Pretty good shade match and IT DOESN'T OXIDIZE!!!! Most foundations leave me looking orange and this one is just perfect for my skin tone. I do hope they come with more olive shades but really big improvement on the share range!!! Overall, I really recommend this!!!

reviews.headline: ooh this is exciting
reviews.comments: i feel like i really matched well to shade 110! it was really soft and it blended in really well! it was a bit streaky though, but i was able to fix it eventually.

reviews.headline: Good coverage
reviews.comments: I read another review that stated there is no coverage, so I had very low expectations when purchasing this product. Not only is this NOT the case, it has MEDIUM coverage in ONE application! It perfectly evens my skintone (and a perfect shade match) while making my skin still look like skin. I was very impressed by the coverage. It's not cakey and blends easily.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: It's really full coverage. It's really good a lot of shades and it's really buttery

faceoff_positive.comments:
The texture of this foundation stick is just right. It is not as stiff as either the Milani or Maybelline stick. It blends out beautifully. It does have a slightly dewy finish, but even so it is blurring. It lasts all day too. I do need to mix two shades to get a good match but since they are so affordable I don't mind. I also go a stick in a lighter shade for concealer and a darker shade for bronzer‚Äîboth work great! 
I use 180 mixed with 140 as foundation 
130 as concealer 
201 as bronzer
faceoff_positive.headline: Good foundation sticks

faceoff_negative.comments: this is not foundation, this even isn't a tint, as it covers nothing. no redness, no skin marks ( pimples, moles, pores)  even if I color correct underneath. I don't know what you would use this product for actually except to clog your pores even more if that's what you are into. Essence used to be the bomb for many of their products, but in 2024-2025 I find their products mostly lacking. their limited edition products are good sometimes, but mostly they don't do what they say their supposed to do. Essence I loved you- please do better!
faceoff_negative.headline: Essence foundation stick
